string.text: Adds colored indicators to canteen icons to indicate dirty (red), boiled (yellow), or purified (blue) water. You may want to disable this if you use another mod or icon pack that adds similar indicators.
Replaces the default icon texture for canteens with an alternate camo-styled one.
Adjusts the color of the purification tablet bottle be more similar to canteens and less similar to other medication like Ibuprofen.
Limit Trader Supply of Canteens and Tablets
Traders sell at most 1 purification tablet bottle at a time, and never sell canteens/flasks. (On tourist difficulty, they will sell 2 bottles and 1 flask).
NOTE: Changes to trader settings take effect the next time those traders restock.
